title: Solomon’s Downfall
summary: Solomon turns from God by marrying many foreign women who lead him into idolatry. God becomes angry and tells Solomon the kingdom will be torn from his son. Jeroboam is chosen to lead part of Israel, and Solomon dies after a long reign.

faq.question: What led to Solomon’s downfall?
faq.answer: His many foreign wives turned his heart to worship other gods.

faq.question: What did God say would happen because of Solomon’s sin?
faq.answer: The kingdom would be torn away from his son and divided.
